languages.text: "Мне было суждено разделить твою участь, элантах, и сгинуть в гниющем подбрюшье Темного города. Однако мастер плоти распорядился иначе. Его искаженный разум задался вопросом: возможно ли "спасти" {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Дитя Азуриана{/g} от взгляда {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Той, Что Жаждет{/g}, методом усердного перевоспитания. Заменить влияние {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}камня души{/g} на дурманящий привкус боли, коим питаются последователи темных путей".

traits.locale_text: "Мне было суждено разделить твою участь, элантах, и сгинуть в гниющем подбрюшье Темного Города. Однако мастер плоти распорядился иначе. Его искаженный разум задался вопросом: возможно ли "спасти" {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Дитя Азуриана{/g}от взгляда {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Той, Что Жаждет{/g}, методом усердного перевоспитания. Заменить влияние {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone }камня души{/g} на дурманящий привкус боли, коим питаются последователи темных путей".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "I was meant to share your fate, elantach, and vanish in the Dark City's rotting underbelly, but the fleshmaster gave a different order. His twisted mind was beset by a question: could a {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g} be 'saved' from the gaze of {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g} with intense re-education? By replacing the influence of my {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}spirit stone{/g} with the heady tang of pain that nourishes the followers of the dark ways?"
languages.original_text: "Мне было суждено разделить твою участь, элантах, и сгинуть в гниющем подбрюшье Темного города. Однако мастер плоти распорядился иначе. By replacing the influence of a {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone }spirit stone{/g} with the heady aftertaste of pain that nourishes my dark cousins?"

By replacing the influence of my {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}spirit stone{/g} with the heady tang of pain that nourishes the followers of the dark ways?"

languages.text: “我本该与你落得相同的命运，外界人。我本该消逝在黑暗之城腐烂的底层，但血肉大师另有安排。他扭曲的意识被这样的问题所困扰——{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}是否可以通过激进的再教育手段获得‘拯救’，避开{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}饥渴女士{/g}的目光？如果消除我的{g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}灵魂石{/g}的影响，改用滋养黑暗之道的痛苦作为替代品，会带来怎样的结果？”
languages.original_text: "I was meant to share your fate, elantach, and vanish in the Dark City's rotting underbelly, but the fleshmaster gave a different order. His twisted mind was beset by a question: could a {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g} be 'saved' from the gaze of {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g} with intense re-education? By replacing the influence of my {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}spirit stone{/g} with the heady tang of pain that nourishes the followers of the dark ways?"

traits.locale_text: “我本该与你落得相同的命运，外界人。我本该消逝在黑暗之城腐烂的底层，但血肉之主另有安排。他扭曲的意识被这样的问题所困扰——{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}是否可以通过激进的再教育手段获得‘拯救’，避开{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}饥渴女士{/g}的目光？如果消除我的{g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone }灵魂石{/g}的影响，改用滋养黑暗之道的痛苦作为替代品，会带来怎样的结果？”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "I was meant to share your fate, elantach, and vanish in the Dark City's rotting underbelly, but the fleshmaster gave a different order. His twisted mind was beset by a question: could a Child of Asuryan be 'saved' from the gaze of She Who Thirsts with intense re-education? By replacing the influence of my spirit stone with the heady tang of pain that nourishes the followers of the dark ways?"

languages.text: «Yo debía compartir tu mismo destino, elantach, y desvanecerme en las entrañas podridas de la Ciudad Siniestra, pero el maestro de la carne tomó otra decisión. Su mente perversa estaba consumida por una pregunta: ¿era posible "salvar" a una {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hija de Asuryan{/g} de la mirada de {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}la Sedienta{/g} a través de la reeducación intensa, reemplazando la influencia de mi {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}joya espiritual{/g} por el embriagador pinchazo de dolor que alimenta a los seguidores de las sendas oscuras?».
languages.original_text: "I was meant to share your fate, elantach, and vanish in the Dark City's rotting underbelly, but the fleshmaster gave a different order. His twisted mind was beset by a question: could a {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g} be 'saved' from the gaze of {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g} with intense re-education? By replacing the influence of my {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}spirit stone{/g} with the heady tang of pain that nourishes the followers of the dark ways?"

traits.locale_text: «Yo debía compartir tu mismo destino, elantach, y desvanecerme en las entrañas podridas de la Ciudad Siniestra, pero el maestro de la carne tomó otra decisión. Su mente perversa estaba consumida por una pregunta: ¿era posible "salvar" a una {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hija de Asuryan{/g} de la mirada de {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}la Sedienta{/g} a través de la reeducación intensa, reemplazando la influencia de mi {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone }joya espiritual{/g} por el embriagador pinchazo de dolor que alimenta a los seguidores de las sendas oscuras?».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「エランタ、私はお前と運命を共にし、仄暗き都の腐敗した地下に消えるはずだった。しかし、肉持つ主は異なる命令を下した。彼の歪んだ心は、ある疑問に悩まされていた。すなわち、{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子ら{/g}は、激しい再教育によって{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}〈かの渇きたる女〉{/g}の視線から「救われる」ことができるのだろうか？と。私の{g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}魂縛石{/g}の影響を、闇の道におちたる信徒たちの滋養となる頭の痛くなるような苦痛に置き換えることで、それは為し得るのだろうか」
languages.original_text: "I was meant to share your fate, elantach, and vanish in the Dark City's rotting underbelly, but the fleshmaster gave a different order. His twisted mind was beset by a question: could a {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g} be 'saved' from the gaze of {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g} with intense re-education? By replacing the influence of my {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}spirit stone{/g} with the heady tang of pain that nourishes the followers of the dark ways?"

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、私はお前と運命を共にし、仄暗き都の腐敗した地下に消えるはずだった。しかし、肉持つ主は異なる命令を下した。彼の歪んだ心は、ある疑問に悩まされていた。すなわち、{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子ら{/g}は、激しい再教育によって{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}〈かの渇きたる女〉{/g}の視線から「救われる」ことができるのだろうか？と。私の{g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone }魂縛石{/g}の影響を、闇の道におちたる信徒たちの滋養となる頭の痛くなるような苦痛に置き換えることで、それは為し得るのだろうか」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich war dazu bestimmt, Euer Schicksal zu teilen, Elantach, und im schwelenden Bauch der Dunklen Stadt zu verschwinden, doch der Fleischmeister gab einen anderen Befehl. Eine Frage war in seinen kranken Verstand gekrochen: Könnte ein {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kind von Asuryan{/g} durch intensive Umerziehung vor dem Blick von {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Ihr, die dürstet{/g}, 'gerettet' werden? Indem man den Einfluss meines {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}Seelensteins{/g} durch den berauschenden Gestank von Schmerzen ersetzt, der die Anhänger der dunklen Wege nährt?"
languages.original_text: "I was meant to share your fate, elantach, and vanish in the Dark City's rotting underbelly, but the fleshmaster gave a different order. His twisted mind was beset by a question: could a {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g} be 'saved' from the gaze of {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g} with intense re-education? By replacing the influence of my {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}spirit stone{/g} with the heady tang of pain that nourishes the followers of the dark ways?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich war dazu bestimmt, Euer Schicksal zu teilen, Elantach, und im schwelenden Bauch der Dunklen Stadt zu verschwinden, doch der Fleischmeister gab einen anderen Befehl. Eine Frage war in seinen kranken Verstand gekrochen: Könnte ein {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kind von Asuryan{/g} durch intensive Umerziehung vor dem Blick von {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Ihr, die dürstet{/g}, 'gerettet' werden? Indem man den Einfluss meines {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}Seelensteins{/g} durch den berauschenden Gestank von Schmerzen ersetzt, der die Anhänger der dunklen Wege nährt?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « J'étais censée connaître le même sort que vous, elantach, et disparaître dans les tréfonds putrides de la Cité Crépusculaire, mais le ciseleur de chair en a décidé autrement. Une question assaillait son esprit tordu : était-il possible de "sauver" une {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfant d'Asuryan{/g} du regard de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Assoiffée{/g} en la soumettant à une rééducation intensive ? En remplaçant l'influence de sa {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}pierre-esprit{/g} par l'odeur entêtante de la douleur qui nourrit les adeptes des voies obscures ? »
languages.original_text: "I was meant to share your fate, elantach, and vanish in the Dark City's rotting underbelly, but the fleshmaster gave a different order. His twisted mind was beset by a question: could a {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g} be 'saved' from the gaze of {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g} with intense re-education? By replacing the influence of my {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}spirit stone{/g} with the heady tang of pain that nourishes the followers of the dark ways?"

traits.locale_text: « J'étais censée connaître le même sort que vous, elantach, et disparaître dans les tréfonds putrides de la Cité Crépusculaire, mais le ciseleur de chair en a décidé autrement. Une question assaillait son esprit tordu : était-il possible de "sauver" une {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfant d'Asuryan{/g} du regard de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Assoiffée{/g} en la soumettant à une rééducation intensive ? En remplaçant l'influence de sa {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone }pierre-esprit{/g} par l'odeur entêtante de la douleur qui nourrit les adeptes des voies obscures ? »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Elantach, seninle aynı kaderi paylaşarak Kara Şehir'in çürümeye yüz tutmuş o tekinsiz bölgelerinde kaybolmam gerekirdi. Ancak etseçerin emri farklıydı. Çarpık zihnine bir soru musallat olmuştu: Bir {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocuğu{/g}, yoğun bir şekilde sil baştan eğitilerek {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Susayan'ın{/g} delici bakışlarından 'kurtarılabilir' miydi? Karanlığa sapan müritlerin beslendiği o kurnaz acının keskinliği, {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}ruh taşımın{/g} tesiriyle yer değişse bu mümkün kılınabilir miydi?"
languages.original_text: "I was meant to share your fate, elantach, and vanish in the Dark City's rotting underbelly, but the fleshmaster gave a different order. His twisted mind was beset by a question: could a {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g} be 'saved' from the gaze of {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g} with intense re-education? By replacing the influence of my {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}spirit stone{/g} with the heady tang of pain that nourishes the followers of the dark ways?"

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, seninle aynı kaderi paylaşarak Kara Şehir'in çürümeye yüz tutmuş o tekinsiz bölgelerinde kaybolmam gerekirdi. Ancak etseçerin emri farklıydı. Çarpık zihnine bir soru musallat olmuştu: Bir {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocuğu{/g}, yoğun bir şekilde sil baştan eğitilerek {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Susayan{/g}'ın delici bakışlarından 'kurtarılabilir' miydi? Karanlığa sapan müritlerin beslendiği o kurnaz acının keskinliği, {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}Ruh Taşı{/g}mın tesiriyle yer değişse bu mümkün kılınabilir miydi?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
